long_description: Stylish, sleek and neat. The Victorinox Vertical Zip daypack is an ultra spacious padded computer pack with divided organization. It holds everything you need for trips to the office or the gym. Padded rear laptop compartment holds up to a 17 in. laptop. Interior organization includes full-length zippered mesh pocket, dual storage pockets, pen slots and key fob. Exterior organization includes vertical-zip front pocket and multi-purpose, zip-close stretch side pockets ideal for a water bottle or umbrella. Compression-molded back panel and compression-molded, adjustable shoulder straps maximize comfort; adjustable sternum strap evenly distributes weight. Victorinox Vertical Zip daypack is made from durable nylon fabric with an abrasion-resistant, reinforced base.
short_description: Stylish, sleek and neat. The Victorinox Vertical Zip daypack is an ultra spacious padded computer pack with divided organization. It holds everything you need for trips to the office or the gym.
